title: Consumerist
note2: "Chris- This one is special. Hearing you speak to the genuine connection you made with this member, the emotions you felt, made me better. Your genuine passion for service and this consumer is contagious to our whole team." -Nate (Nike Director)

title: Operationalist
note: Momentum - create and dominate. As a Nike Expert I promoted good speed practices of advanced and expedient computer navigation and usage, and provided hard copies for the team with the current launch styles.
note2: Sustaining, takes a bit more savvy. That is where relationship building, with a personalized and expert tone comes in.

title: Strategist
note: Strategy is where there is room for 'test and learn'
note2: A specific example was a follow up strategy, where in using the chat platform, I tagged every chat with a hashtag for easier follow ups.

title: Responsibility
note: Create the best running gear in the world while we reduce our environmental impact in line with climate science, create positive social change and be transparent about these efforts.
note2: Product Sustainability, Climate Action, Responsible Sourcing

title: Offense
note: It takes a good offense to stay on top.
note2: To keep Brooks runners running Happy, we have to be front runners, we have to be better than our competitors, maitain control, listen to the needs of our runners and bring more into the Brooks family with strategies like clientelling.

title: Win as a Team
note2: A championing culture only manifests when Results and Relationships come together at the highest level.

title: Surpirse and Delight
note: Single Mom with a YouTube star daughter - Pineapple House Kyrie 5
note2: 14 year old golfer, 8th at State - Lead team to State Championship - Vapor Cleats and Golf Glove
note3: Adapt Member with special need for self lacing shoes. Won as team w/NACS and theVan partners

title: Interaction Of The Week

title: Get to know your Runner
note2: Through conversational commerce, able to quickly create connection and chemistry with runners.
